name: Hacker Mania
description:
Hacker Mania is a 2D casual logic game in which the player wants to stop evil viruses from attacking your computer. In order to do this, the player must match falling arrows with the correct direction and color.  The degree of difficulty increases the longer the player plays the game. How long can you keep the viruses away?

Credits:
Background Music: https://www.youtube.com/user/heatleybros

Sound Effects: Unity Asset Store

PC icon, designed by Freepik: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/consoles-set-in-pixel-art-style_965892.htm

Pixel Heart, designed by Freepik: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/valentine-s-day-card-in-pixel-art-style_1024308.htm#term=pixel%20heart&page=1&position=5
